original_text: These rules decide when a person has a disease. And they decide when he is clean. They show when a house has a disease. They are the rules for diseases in the skin and for mildew.
korean_text: 어느 때는 부정하고 어느 때는 정함을 가르치는 것이니 나병의 규례가 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: These rules decide when a person has a disease
sentences.korean_translation: 이 규칙들은 사람이 질병을 가졌을 때를 결정합니다

sentences.original_text: And they decide when he is clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그가 정결한 때를 결정합니다

sentences.original_text: They show when a house has a disease
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 집이 질병을 가졌을 때를 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: They are the rules for diseases in the skin
